name: Guild Siege Golem Blueprints
description: Use to construct a guild siege golem build site. It has a lower supply cost than the alpha siege golem. Range 225. Requires 50 supply to complete.

name: Saphir's Leather Breather
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the ancient Shining Blade armorer, Saphir.</c>

name: Mithril Snake
description: Used to craft Howl.

name: Reactor Meltdown
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Oiled Hardened Longcoat Panel
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Coats.

name: Essence of Ancient Mysticism
description: Use this essence to craft a first-tier precursor.

name: Half-Eaten Backpack
description: Double-click to open.

name: Auric Greatsword Shielding
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Black Diamond Orichalcum Amulet
description: A recipe to make a Black Diamond Orichalcum Amulet.

name: Half-Eaten Backpack
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Wanderer's Pearl Bludgeoner
description: A recipe to make a Wanderer's Pearl Bludgeoner.

name: Enraged Spider Queen's Venom
description: Double-click to combine the venoms of a Canyon Spider Queen, Toxic Spider Queen, Enraged Spider Queen, and Gargantula in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Arachnid Venom Decanter.

name: Recipe: Ossa's Wand
description: A recipe to make an ascended scepter with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

name: Maklain's Striders
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous minstrel, Maklain.</c>

name: Star Chart: Gnarl of Melandru
description: Double-click to combine the four human star charts into the Human Constellation Chapter.

name: Amber Quantic Dipole
description: Combine with 3 Mini Professor Mews in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Mister Mittens.

name: Tizlak's Wristguards
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the great Nuhoch commander, Tizlak.</c>

name: Chak-Shell Ocarina
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Moonstone Orichalcum Ring
description: A recipe to make a Moonstone Orichalcum Ring.

name: Living Flame
description: Used to craft The Hunter.

name: Bag of Masterwork Gear
description: Double-click to open.

name: Practical Scribe's Backpack
description: Unequip this backpack to use it as a crafting ingredient. Using this as a crafting ingredient will destroy any upgrades it contains.

name: Dune Soarer Tentacle
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Angchu Cloth Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended light breather with Cavalier (+Toughness, +Power, and +Ferocity) stats.

name: Attuned Cirque of Arah
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Viathan Lake Talisman
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Laranthir's Breastplate
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Vigil leader, Laranthir of the Wild.</c>

name: Spooky Cauldron
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Spirit-Powered Horn
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Thesis on Speed
description: Thesis: Double-click to set out a tome to share with anyone in the area. Stays active for 5 minutes.

name: Itzel Defense Strategy
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Used to craft decorations.

name: Soul Battery Fragment

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the great Nuhoch commander, Tizlak.</c>

description: Used by Draithor the Drill in Kessex Hills in his necromantic experiments.

name: Milling Stone
description: Used to process flax seeds into linseed oil and cassava root into cassava flour.

name: Recipe: Chiaroscuro Short Bows
description:
Unlocks the following recipes:
• Shimmering Short Bow
• Tenebrous Short Bow

name: Mushroom Cache
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>

name: Bladed Headgear Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Gold Fractal Weapon Crate
description: Double-click to choose a Gold Fractal weapon.

name: Magically Charged Infusion Sample
description:
Created by combining a +8 Agony Infusion with the mist geyser located in the Snowblind fractal.
This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Golden Feather Wings Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Golden Feather Wings Backpack
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.
